module: Module-level comment: The "half_adder" module performs single-bit binary addition, generating a sum (`o_sum`) and a carry (`o_carry`). It computes `o_sum` using an XOR of inputs `i_a` and `i_b`, and `o_carry` using an AND operation, directly assigning these results to outputs without intermediate signals. This efficient design facilitates integration into larger binary addition systems.
